data.description:
**( NO SETUP IS NEEDED TO PLAY )**

Updated with every user suggestion at least twice a week for multiple months in a row, Top Features are:

**3D Coverage Everywhere**

‚Ä¢Almost every identifiable city on earth is in realistic 3D, even my tiny town in a poor side of Romania is covered, so you are probably able to visit your own street in 3D

**ChatGPT Integration: The AI companion can**

‚Ä¢Help with user interface

‚Ä¢Hear, See and Talk in any language

‚Ä¢Offer information about surroundings

‚Ä¢Teleport you anywhere on earth

‚Ä¢Interact with Street View

**Realistic Sky Mode**

‚Ä¢Realistic Real-time Lighting and Day/Night Cycle with no Performance Impact

**Street View**

‚Ä¢Highest 8k resolution quality on the market, with every street on earth and every panorama taken by people

**Multiplayer**

‚Ä¢With friends

**Terrain Quality**

‚Ä¢EarthQuest's 3D Map Quality can go much further than anything else out there and achieve realistic results by pushing the terrain quality to insane detail and range with the best performance in the industry

**Google Maps**

‚Ä¢Intelligent or manual zoom based on altitude

‚Ä¢Switchable Google Maps Interface

‚Ä¢Paired with the compass feature for body orientation

**Consistent Hand Tracking**

‚Ä¢Rotate by Grabbing an Imaginary Steering Wheel

‚Ä¢Fly by Pointing your Index Finger in the Direction of Flight

‚Ä¢Unrestricted menu interaction

**Customizable Flight Controls**

‚Ä¢Button Remapping

‚Ä¢Comfort Settings

‚Ä¢Flight Controls Range from Simple to Complex Cinematic Flying

**..out of space, check "earthquest.site" for all features..**

changelog.change_log:
@everyone
v27 is Released !
 
As you already know, EarthQuest gets **at least** one **big** update a week thanks to the massive amount of work that goes into EQ daily - so **the phrase** ***‚ÄùBiggest EarthQuest Update EVER‚Äù*** gets obviously said a lot üòÖ

Well, this time it‚Äôs not even close to ‚Äúa BIG update‚Äù, **in fact**, this is the **ACTUAL FIRST** important milestone of EarthQuest, it‚Äôs not just a complete redesign, **EVERYTHING IN EARTHQUEST IS IMPROVED**, with over 11 user suggestions implementations ( newer and older ), **yes, I‚Äôve said 11 suggestions introduced**, This is the most innovative and comprehensive update ever released :

**1.** 8K Street View: EarthQuest now offers the highest Street View quality compared to any other VR travel app. See:  ‚Ä¶.

**2.** COMPLETE User Interface Redesign, each setting within its own category, around 2.5 times overall smaller menu, and MUCH easier to navigate and understand functionality

**3.** Entire **Hub Environment Redesign**,
EarthQuest now represents the world in the Hub Environment using probably **the most realistic digital Earth model you‚Äôve ever seen**,  with textures over hundreds of millions of pixels each  ( no performance impact )

**4.** Speed Measurement ( in kilometers and miles per hour ), Distance Measurement between two locations in meters, kilometers, feet, and miles, see how it works here: https://discord.com/channels/1155548213646999693/1251578399369990144/1251578399369990144, and Map Zoom functionality at every altitude

**5.** An abundance of new User Interface functionality - The new user interface redesign wouldn‚Äôt be finished without new functionality, so it now has
‚Ä¢ **Menu Category Selection Highlight**
‚Ä¢ **Resolution Setting Indication Value**
‚Ä¢ **Flight Speed Indication Value**

**6.** Improved AI in every way, and AI integration with Street View

**7.** Improved Immersive Sky Mode with realism in mind

**AND SOOO MUCH MORE, If encountering any issue or observing that something is not working as expected, please let me know as soon as possible, Thank You** ‚ù§Ô∏è

**This announcement is shortened a lot, Please check out the FULL LIST OF CHANGES for more details and explanations here :** ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..

v26.00 is OUT!! The Biggest Update Yet??

1. Introduced a seamlessly integrated Vignette (View Boundary to eliminate motion sickness) Comfort Feature!

1.2. Introduced a Hub Menu Selection Highlighter feature to show what and which settings are currently selected and in use.

1.3. Redesigned the Hub Menu Layout to allow the Vignette Feature and all Comfort Settings to be easily and intuitively customized efficiently.

2. The Street View Loading Screen is now Transparent! This allows viewing the 3D environment while waiting 1-2 seconds for each new panorama to load.

2.2. Street View Loading Screen is now High Resolution and has a different design!

3. Flight Boost Trigger Buttons are now Pressure Sensitive (More Pressure = More Boost) and can now be used at the same time to accumulate double boost!

4. AI now has a Sound Effect to notify the user when the Microphone starts recording your voice.

5. Updated Hub "EarthQuest" Title Model and Texture.

6. Renamed the "VR Background" Feature to "AR Background."

This is a BIG one! Please let me know ASAP if something doesn't work as expected. I tested everything as much as I could.

v25 is set, your best bet yet üòÜ 

1.Thanks to the Meta Quest Support team, the Hand Tracking ‚Äò required ‚Äô issue is now solved !!

2. The Controller ‚ÄòMenu‚Äô button and Hand Tracking ‚ÄòPinch to open Menu‚Äô gesture are now both connected to the EarthQuest menu ! - You‚Äôll now have an easier, more efficient & intuitive alternative way of Opening / Closing the Menu !

3. A more concise Hub Menu button layout ( multiplayer section )

3.2. Changed the Multiplayer Button in the Hub for choosing a Room Name from "Type Room Code" to "Type Room Name" to avoid confusion and for consistency

4. Fixed distance from sea level in meters *glitching out* when going over 9999999m

5. Modified the terrain allocated memory very slightly to potentially completely solve the ' out of memory ' system crash that's happening extremely rarely due to some OS inconsistency.

https://youtu.be/mpxN1LxR4KI

v24.53 is Out

**1.** Made a change to potentially fix the rare "Out of memory" crash that happened on Q3 when using max settings -** if it still happens, please let me know immediately** so i can make sure it's fully fixed in the next version.

**2.** Introduced the website ( ***earthquest.site***, ***faq.earthquest.site*** ) addresses in the hub, and rewritten a note to be shorter and more concise.

**3.** Rephrased a few notes in the API Setup

--

A Big **Terrain Visual** Upgrade that improves long distance rendering, and multiple **Performance** Improvements - v24.50 is Out !!

**1.** Introduced a Z-Buffer Management System, basically using the Camera Rendering distances ( minimum - maximum ) to their full potential to **maximize rendering accuracy** ( for distant terrain ) based on altitude, player scale, and other factors !!!

**So yes,** terrain flickering is now as low as it can **technically be achieved** with the current player scaling :D
Previously, the flickering effect was visible even when using the larger player scales, **now,** you'll notice that the flickering is **barely visible at small player scales** and greatly minimized on very distant landscapes. **In fact, the flickering COMPLETELY disappears after the player scale value of 150 !!**

**1.2.** Thanks to this system, computing performance is also improved due to the less **non-visible** data being rendered on occluded terrain ( like on the other side of Earth ) or very far terrain surfaces that were otherwise not present in the user‚Äôs perspective.

**2.** AI Vision should now also be better thanks to improved AI image quality - so AI responses about visual location recognition should now be slightly improved !!!

**3.** Much, **much** Smoother Earth Scaling and Overall Visualization from High Altitudes !!

**4.** **Tons and tons** of code optimizations for computing performance !

A Big **Terrain Visual** Upgrade that improves long distance rendering, and multiple **Performance** Improvements - v24.50 is Out !!

**1.** Introduced a Z-Buffer Management System, basically using the Camera Rendering distances ( minimum - maximum ) to their full potential to **maximize rendering accuracy** ( for distant terrain ) based on altitude, player scale, and other factors !!!

**So yes,** terrain flickering is now as low as it can **technically be achieved** with the current player scaling :D
Previously, the flickering effect was visible even when using the larger player scales, **now,** you'll notice that the flickering is **barely visible at small player scales** and greatly minimized on very distant landscapes. **In fact, the flickering COMPLETELY disappears after the player scale value of 150 !!**

**1.2.** Thanks to this system, computing performance is also improved due to the less **non-visible** data being rendered on occluded terrain ( like on the other side of Earth ) or very far terrain surfaces that were otherwise not present in the user‚Äôs perspective.

**2.** AI Vision should now also be better thanks to improved AI image quality - so AI responses about visual location recognition should now be slightly improved !!!

**3.** Much, **much** Smoother Earth Scaling and Overall Visualization from High Altitudes !!

**4.** **Tons and tons** of code optimizations for computing performance !
